title: Tutorial.Start
body:
This is the tutorial Area!
Use the WASD keys to move around
The NPCs will follow you wherever you go
they're as dumb as you are.
Your purpose is to find and collect blue rithodin crystals
Move to the next area!

title: Tutorial.Mining
body:
See that blue sparkly thing? Thats a crystal
Crystals are an important part of the r-steel refining process
Only you, a channeler, can see and react to crystals
Go up and touch it to see what happens

title: Tutorial.Mining2
body:
When you touched the crystal, workers carrying a pickaxe know to start mining
When a crystal reaches critical mass, it breaks apart into smaller chunks
that's when the workers with carrying bags scramble for them
Now, for the real fun, go to the next section

title: Tutorial.Combat
body:
The Crystal caves are populated by these fucking weird bugs
for some reason they get really angry when you try to take the crystals
It's been observed that when miners start hitting a crystal, that's when bugs tend to swarm
for the purposes of training, we'll just relese some for you to play with
When you see bugs, you can hit the "E" key to send the sword guy to attack them
or you can use the arrow keys to send a beam of energy, killing them
If your carriers die, you can't bring crystal back to the surface
if your miners die, you can't mine crystals
So keep them alive, if you'd like to live yourself

title: Tutorial.Combat2
body:
In this next area we've brought a collection of flora
Flora attack all creatures that pass by them with deadly projectile spores
It's in your best intrest to eliminate them, or avoid them, I'm not your mom
You can use your power to heal your fellow workers, but it'll also cost you health
alternativly if you're feeling low on health, you can extract it from your fellow workers
press F to heal, but press G if you want to heal yourself
don't get too enthusiastic, you'll kill your comrads, or yourself

title: Tutorial.End
body:
That's the end of the tutorial
To exit a cave, go back to the elevator that dropped you off
But remember, if you don't bring enough back to the surface 
you'll have to go back down for more
have fun!
